articles.title: No compromise reached, but constructive: Russia on Ukraine peace talks with US
articles.description: Russia and the US made no breakthrough on a Ukraine peace deal after a five-hour Kremlin meeting, during which both sides discussed the initial US plan was broken down into four parts, said Putin’s top diplomatic aide.
articles.content: Talks between Russian President Vladimir Putin and US President Donald Trump’s special envoy Steve Witkoff aimed at ending the nearly four-year war in Ukraine were described as “constructive,” but “no compromise” was reached on territorial concession... [3870 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Newcastle v Spurs: The cost of dropped points
articles.description: Newcastle United have dropped more points from winning positions than any other side in the Premier League this season - the tally now stands at 11 after Tuesday's 2-2 draw with Tottenham.
articles.content:

articles.title: ‘No idea how he didn’t win the Ballon d’Or’ - Diego Simeone hails Raphinha after Barcelona win
articles.description: Some generous words after the game at Camp Nou.
articles.content:
”Raphinha is an incredible player. He can play everywhere. As a winger, as a midfielder, as a striker, or even as a wing back,” he told the medida.
“He can score, he can create, he presses and runs. I have no idea how he did not win the Ballon d’Or.”... [330 chars]
